name: Sungka
description:
The traditional Southeast Asian game of Sungka, now made for a modern audience. Enter a zen and engage in a casual game of skill and calculation. Out do your opponents by accumulating as many tokens as you can onto your side. Sungka brings casual and competitive games between friends and strangers, to players all over the world. With each player being able to play multiple games simultaneously, the fun never stops.

Includes LOCAL 2 PLAYER
